name: TKNRobotics
title: [TKN] Robotics
author: kleopi
description: Adds two new types of robots: Earlyrobots, made from cheap materials,unlocked early on and lightningrobots, pricey but extremely fast. Works well will other mods, including bob and angel. Last Update: Changed recipes of Logistic chests to not require Advanced Circuits anymore. Lightningbots now need Processing-units now. For discussions join our Discord: discord.gg/G9QwJWA
